thread.title: It's official: Cory Stark named KMOV morning co-anchor
thread.title_full: It's official: Cory Stark named KMOV morning co-anchor

author: Joe Holleman St. Louis Post-Dispatch
title: It's official: Cory Stark named KMOV morning co-anchor
text:
KMOV 
Cory Stark 
Early-bird viewers of KMOV (Channel 4) will continue to have Cory Stark serving as the co-anchor for the station's morning news. 
Station general manager Mike Murphy said Stark, who has filled the slot since Andre Hepkins left in October, has been officially named to the post. 
Stark started at KMOV as a night-side reporter in November 2013, and then was moved up to a weekend anchor slot. Before returning home, the Marquette High graduate worked in Cincinnati and Indiana. Tags
